raw akas.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy

akas: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (original title)
akas from release info: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (original title)

1.title: Larry Herds Dinosaurs

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Larry takes a treacherous trip through Arizona to find out why folks choose to live in this sun-scorched state. His first creepy-crawly encounter is with a family that uses this desert landscape as a natural resource for their spider venom business.

2.title: Larry vs. The Killer Bees

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Larry makes his way across Iowa to become a carny at one of America's oldest state fairs! Larry's trip starts with a chance meeting with an alligator wrestler, which leads to Larry and crew watching over a baby gator on their way to Des Moines.

3.title: Larry Gets Lost in Space

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: The destination is Roswell as Larry and crew make a pilgrimage across the space-crazed state of New Mexico. However, after some stops along the historic trail of space history, the trip takes a very dramatic turn! An amateur rocket scientist launches an intrepid Larry the Cable Guy bobblehead into the edge of space, accompanied by his cameraman's wedding ring. But when GPS complications ensue, finding Space Larry and the ring becomes a thrilling race against time. The show ends with a freaky and funny set of close encounters with the alien experts of Roswell.

4.title: Larry Confronts the Apocalypse

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Larry uncovers how ingenuity, passion, sweat and sugar made Pennsylvania an industrial powerhouse. He starts by braving heights and heat as he joins a bunch of boilermakers as they do their gritty work on a Pittsburgh area power plant.

5.title: Larry Gets Trashed and Tanked

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Larry is on a mission to show how America is the land of the great ideas and finds all the evidence he needs on a road trip through Minnesota. The adventure starts on an extremely stinky note as Larry works with a farmer who turns restaurant scraps into a nutritious feed for his hogs. Larry then shows up at the doorsteps of Minnesotans responsible for three major inventions: the Post-It Note, the Nerf Ball and the game of Twister! After a weird side trip to a beard and mustache competition, Larry concludes on a highly destructive note at an innovative business called ...

6.title: Does Larry Eat Poop?

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Larry's on the hunt for the crazy critters that have tormented Floridians for ages. First, he steps lightly as he follows one of the state' leading herpetologist as he tracks and collects some of the most venomous snakes in the world.

7.title: Larry Crushes the Competition

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Larry road trips through Missouri to show how American obsessions can turn into everything from extremely odd contests to a billion-dollar business. He starts by seeing just how far a fixation with anvils can take a man.

8.title: Larry's Vegas Hangover

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Larry heads to Las Vegas to immerse himself in the extremes that only Sin City can provide. He starts aboard the Hangover Heaven bus, a roving recovery vehicle for last night's hard partiers.

9.title: Larry Goes Boom

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Larry heads to the modern day "black gold rush" in Williston, North Dakota and sees how the recent oil boom has changed this small town. The Cable Guy gets deputized by the Sheriff's department and heads out to help keep the peace.

10.title: Larry's Beantown Lowdown

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Larry wants to show you how Boston is the Cradle of Liberty and so much more. His trip to Beantown starts with a surprising look at how the West Coast craze for customizing "lowrider" cars has taken hold in the historic Dorchester neighborhood.

11.title: Larry Goes Hollyweird

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Larry sets out to show us that Los Angeles is still the world's leading producer of peculiar people, a task that proves to be amazingly easy. He first tackles the array of wacky health fads.

12.title: Larry Sees Dead People

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Larry's Lone Star State adventure is all about investigating some truly "only in Texas" phenomena. His first stop is at the not-for-the-squeamish "Body Farm," a place where the students (all female, for some reason) study human decomposition.

13.title: Larry Caves In

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Larry will prove that Americans know how to get the most out of nature--even if it kills him! This arduous trip through the Tennessee Valley begins as he spelunks his way through a mile of dark caverns to get to the Lost Sea.

14.title: Larry Squeezes Chicks

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Larry road trips through the "Show Me State" on a quest to crash a few shows in Branson, the Vegas of the Midwest. The first show he crashes, though, is across the state line in Topeka, Kansas where Larry gets in on the action at a prestigious dog show.

15.title: Larry Gets Whipped

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Larry travels to the Big Apple to show how that town exemplifies great American qualities like keeping cultures alive and never giving up the fight. He starts by uncovering how terriers have become an ally in New York's long running war of Man versus Rat.

16.title: Larry Becomes Statuesque

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: On a drive through Central Illinois, Larry and crew use their Internet connections to see how Americans are making their own breaks. They first come across a true find: a couple of farm boys who are making a mint by harvesting the finest deer pee.

1.title: Larry Makes Moonshine

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Larry gets knee deep in Moonshine's secret history, becomes a champion frog jumper in California, and gets a refresher course in table manners in Vermont.

2.title: Larry Goes to the Swamp

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Larry visits people who live in the Atchafalaya Swamp in Louisiana, the Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey traveling circus in Virginia, and a soap box derby in Oregon.

3.title: Larry Shoots Guns

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: The destination is Roswell as Larry and crew make a pilgrimage across the space-crazed state of New Mexico. However, after some stops along the historic trail of space history, the trip takes a very dramatic turn! An amateur rocket scientist launches an intrepid Larry the Cable Guy bobblehead into the edge of space, accompanied by his cameraman's wedding ring. But when GPS complications ensue, finding Space Larry and the ring becomes a thrilling race against time. The show ends with a freaky and funny set of close encounters with the alien experts of Roswell.

4.title: Larry Breeds Mules

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Larry breeds mules descended from George Washington's herd and digs up a rock quarry owned by a true American eccentric.

5.title: Larry Races Dogs

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Larry breeds mules descended from George Washington's herd and digs up a rock quarry owned by a true American eccentric.

6.title: Larry Gits a Gator

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Larry tracks down rogue alligators which have invaded civilization, mixes explosives in with America's first family of fireworks, and gets muscled in the roller derby.

7.title: Larry Goes Trucking

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Larry showers with a friend at America's biggest truck stop, experiences the danger of fish-mongering, and uncovers mayhem at the demolition derby.

8.title: Larry Is an Astronaut

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Larry uses a far out toilet at NASA, impersonates himself in a Las Vegas standup act, and gets wet at the site of a prehistoric flood.

9.title: Larry Rides with the Hells Angels

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Larry hitches a ride with the Hells Angels, helps catch potential cheaters at a Las Vegas casino, and enlists with a Civil War recreation group.

10.title: Larry Deep Fries Everything

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Larry gets embedded with the grunts at Camp Pendleton, travels to America's smallest town and jumps into the delicious, deep-frying madness that is the biggest draw at the annual State Fair of Texas.

11.title: Larry Digs for Gold

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Larry lives the history of the great California Gold Rush, explores the wacky world of the minor league baseball franchise Saint Paul Saints and joins a gospel choir that lifts spirits at a tough Chicago hospital.

12.title: Larry in Hillbilly Country

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Larry gets deep in the muddy banks of South Carolina as he uncovers the messy world of oyster harvesting; discovers the survival skills of an American family that has been there for over 250 years; and turns a routine stop on Interstate 80 into a mission to find out what is special in the tiny town of Wells, Nevada.

13.title: Larry Is a Logger

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: It's back to school for Larry as he spends a day in high school in Bemidji, Minnesota; reveals the miracle that is the cable car system and the hidden worlds of Chinatown; and finally does the manliest work in the timber business at the Rough n Ready Lumber Company in Oregon.

14.title: Larry Goes North

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Larry adds his girth and glee to the Dallas Cowboy Cheerleaders, goes dog sledding in Northern Minnesota and reveals how Tabasco became the world's greatest hot sauce.

15.title: Larry is the Sheriff

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Larry joins the Volusia County Sheriff's Department in Florida to reveal all the ways that this far-ranging branch of law enforcement keeps us safe. Then he saddles up and plays polo, the dangerous and expensive sport that was transformed by America's upper class thrill-seekers. Finally, Larry uncovers how barbecued brisket became an American delicacy at Houston's Goode Company.

16.title: Larry Steps Into the Ring

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

16.plot: Larry shows us one of the greatest animal exhibitions on the planet at the amazing Henry Doorly Zoo. Then, he digs in at Dakin Farms in Vermont, where they have been making mouthwatering breakfast staples since 1792. Finally, he puts up his dukes at Gleason's, the legendary Brooklyn boxing gym that gave us everyone from Jake LaMotta to Muhammad Ali to Mike Tyson.

17.title: Larry Is Amish

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

17.plot: We break comedic ground as Larry the Cable Guy takes a zany spin around the U.S. From the Oregon Trail to the Grand Canyon, from crossing the Delaware to searching for California's gold, Larry's signature persona delivers offbeat America, with stories of real history and loads of down-home fun.

18.title: Larry Beefs Up

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

18.plot: Larry is in his element at an old-fashioned livestock auction in Oklahoma, discovers the vast world of longshoremen in New York Harbor and celebrates the hundredth anniversary of the Boy Scouts of America.

19.title: Larry Cuts the Cheese

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

19.plot: Larry gets the thrill of a lifetime on the deck of the the USS Nimitz. Then he's off to show us why Wisconsin is so famous for cheese. Finally, Larry goes on a "sleigh ride" with the mysterious Secret Santa of Kansas City.

20.title: Larry & the Superpig

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

20.plot: Larry reveals how the humble hog helped shape our country as he works on an "heirloom" pig farm in South Carolina. Then he revisits his wild trip to the Houston Rodeo, showing viewers for the first time just how challenged he was by his bullfighting barrel ride. Finally, Larry uncovers the secrets behind Central Park, New York's carefully planned natural wonderland.

1.title: Alaska Moose Season

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Larry visits Alaska to hunt down moose poachers, visit a high school football team's strange ritual, and also makes a surprise visit to Sarah Palin's family.

2.title: Mutant All-Beef Road Trip

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Larry visits Wisconsin to visit a milking house, watch a calf being born, take a bite out of the world's largest cheeseburger, and visit a meat packing plant, as well as deal with a prank from his camera crew.

3.title: Extreme American Critters

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Larry spends this episode going to extremes to show you how Americans go to extremes when it comes to animals. He begins in the coastal marshes of Florida where he's assisting a scientist with the ultimate alligator obsession. Larry helps the young researcher take blood, urine and even vomit from gators in the name of science. The he is off to Colorado, where a terrified Larry works with the brave, dedicated staff of Serenity Springs, a haven that takes in ferocious big felines that have nowhere else to go and gives them state-of-the-art medical and dental care. ...

4.title: Naked Cowboys & Reptile Wrangling

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Larry first goes south to experience the extreme jobs involving alligators and then goes to New York City to watch a man famously make a living using a silly gimmick: Play a guitar in just his underwear.

5.title: American Guns

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Larry trains to stalk and shoot with the US Army's elite snipers at their training center in Fort Benning, GA. Then he heads to Colorado Springs, Colorado to meet "the most armed man in America" who goes by the name Dragon Man. Finally, Larry goes to the deep Ozarks to see how squirrel hunting created the original American sharpshooters.

6.title: Redneck Extravaganzas

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Larry heads down south to show us how the American redneck creates entertainment. He first goes to New Smyrna Beach, Florida, to put his redneck cred on the line as he tries his hand at mud bogging. Then in Tampa, Florida Larry sees how good ol' boys who like to wreck stuff put their martial arts "breaking" skills to use as they attempt to tear down a whole house by hand. Finally, Larry meets up with Bubba Blackwell, an American daredevil who tries to jump a bunch of buses.

7.title: Larry's Favorite Stuff

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Larry enjoys some of his favorite things such as driving cattle in Florida, selling used cars in New Jersey, and working with a man named "Mr. John", who cleans porta-potties.

8.title: America After Dark

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Larry checks what goes on at night. First, Larry gets goes shrimping with a four-generation shrimping family as they head into shark-infested waters at night. Then, Larry helps exterminators catch critters that only come out in the dark. Finally, Larry searches for paranormal activity when he joins a team investigating agitators from the afterlife at a haunted Virginia historical site.

9.title: Larry Goes to Washington

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Larry spends a few days getting behind-the-scenes at some sites in our nation's capitol. He first gets access to the nerve center of the Pentagon few civilians have never seen before. He was the first on air talent from a none news crew allowed in the War Room as he explains during the program. Then Larry gets inside the FBI by being an actor. His participation in FBI scenario training reveals how agents master self-control and situational awareness. Larry then tries to become a G-Man and finally Larry tries at being a DC tour guide on the Amphibious vehicle DC Ducks ...

10.title: American Invasion

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: Larry joins in with citizens who deal with critters that have invaded our country. First, Larry teams with a pair of guys who use GPS-enhanced dogs and their own strength to deal with the pesky problem that is the feral pig. Larry then heads to Louisiana to catch nutria, a large, ugly and very hungry rodent that has been destroying the natural vegetation and chowing down on the levies. Larry ends his trip at a "carp rodeo" in Iowa, a wild and watery way to control the population of a voracious species of fish.

11.title: Kentucky Road Trip

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: Larry visits the great American worker at the plant making the great American muscle car the Corvette. Larry also takes a quick visit to Louisville to visit the Louisville Slugger manufacturer. Then Larry goes searching for Bigfoot and aims to see if Kentucky has the best Sasquatch hunters anywhere.

12.title: Louisiana Road Trip

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Larry spends some time in and around New Orleans to see the way they do things in the Big Easy. First, Larry tackles fishing for Silver Carp and Gar and lands a bunch. Larry goes after the freaky fish that is the favorite challenge he good ol' boys of Morgan City, Louisiana. Next, Larry helps clean the mess that is the French Quarter the morning after a typical weekend. He also visits a warehouse where all year long people create and house the parade floats for the yearly Mardi Gras Parade.

13.title: Special Access

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: Larry goes where no one goes. Behind-the-curtain at some American spots that are always marked "Authorized Persons Only." First, Larry goes to a secret location to help the ultimate bomb squad get rid of explosive material. Next, Larry goes to the Minneapolis-Saint Paul International Airport and joins the TSA and is shown how they check baggage and passengers. And Larry gets inside the everyday media machine at WGNO TV New Orleans, LA and is a reporter for a day.

-1.title: Larry Gets the Horns

episode of.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy (TV Series 2011– )

-1.plot: Larry visits Texas for the largest rodeo to learn about bull-riding, clowning, and proctology; he shovels coal on a railroad in Chattanooga, and rides the steepest rail; and he performs weddings in Las Vegas.

imdb.title: Only in America with Larry the Cable Guy
plot: Larry trolls around the US eating stuff and cracking one liners::Art Vandalay
